String: Every time you use physical Skills, restore SP by {POTENCY}.

Add 30% of the Bard's Willpower to any allies Attribute checks. (If there are several bards, only the one with the most willpower will be added as modifier.)

Additionally everytime a Song is played, restore a small amount of BP for all allies.
Reduce the AP cost of songs by 1 and their cooldown by 2.
Add an additional {POTENCY}% of your Strength Bonus to your Physical Attack Bonus.

Increase the amount of Counter per round by {POTENCY}.

Counter:
If Character gets targeted by a skill from an adjacent enemy, they will automatically attack the aggressor dealing 100% Physical Damage at 80% base Accuracy.
A collection of basic offensive spells for novices.
A collection of basic support spells for novices.
A collection of advanced support spells for veterans.
A collection of basic greatsword techniques for novices.
A collection of advanced greatsword techniques for Veterans.
A collection of basic skills to take control of the battlefield.
A collection of advanced skills to take control of the battlefield.
A collection of basic healing spells for novices.
A collection of advanced healing spells for veterans.
A collection of basic protection spells for novices.
A collection of advanced protection spells for veterans.
A collection of basic bow techniques for novices.
A collection of advanced bow techniques for veterans.
A collection of legendary bow techniques for masters of the bow.
A collection of minor offensive divine spells for war priests.
A collection of basic dagger techniques for novices.
A collection of advanced dagger techniques for veterans.
A collection of songs common to bards.
The effect range of all song skills with Selection Type <color=yellow>"Self"</color> become Mapwide.
A collection of skills commonly known to paladins.
Reduce the AP cost of Dagger Skills by 1.
A collection of greater offensive divine spells for war priests.
{POTENCY}% of Physical Damage gained through items and traits will be added to MAB.
Instead of an action point a movement point will be refunded if Character kills an enemy and the movement point has already been used.
A collection of legendary dagger techniques for masters in the art of killing.
A collection of legendary Sword and Shield techniques for masterful protectors.
As long Bravery state is at least at even, reduce damage by {POTENCY}%
A collection of legendary support spells to make the most of any adventurer.
Physical Skills of enemies can only have a max. hit chance of {POTENCY}% against this character. Does not apply on enemies with <color=orange>{TRUE_SIGHT}</color>.
A collection of legendary greatsword techniques for sword masters.
On Turn start: For every 10% below 50% Health, Character gains an {EMPOWERED} Stack.
Increase Physical Resistance by {POTENCY} for each point in {ENDURANCE}.
Increase Potency of Earth Spells by {POTENCY}. Earth spells that can affect enemies, will now also have a chance to stagger their target.
Increase Potency of Fire Spells by {POTENCY}. Fire spells that can affect enemies, will now also have a chance to set their targets on fire. Burning enemies can not regenerate.
Increase Potency of Ice Spells by {POTENCY}. Ice spells that can affect enemies, will now also have a chance to chill their target.
Increase Potency of lightning Spells by {POTENCY}. Lightning spells that can affect enemies, will now also have a chance to shock their target.
Increase damage against undead and demons by {POTENCY}%.
Increase the range of Ranged Divine Skills by {POTENCY}.
Ice Damage heals the Character instead of damaging them. Cannot be chilled or frozen.
A collection of simple martial arts techniques.
A collection of advanced martial arts techniques.
A collection of skills that allows a dragon knight to mimic the abilities of a dragon.
A collection of martial arts skills to move on the battlefield
The secret techniques of the Azure Style
Fire Damage heals the Character instead of damaging them. Character cannot be burned.
Hostile ranged skills have {POTENCY} less accuracy against this target.
Every skill that can be dodged, can also be blocked.
For every tile higher than your target, increase your damage by {POTENCY}%. (Max. 50%)
Attack Of Opportunities are {POTENCY}% less likely to hit.
As long there is no adjacent enemy that threatens the unit, increase hitchance of ranged skills by {POTENCY}. If there is an adjacent enemy, the unit can't use ranged skills.
A collection of skills used to direct the Beastmaster's companion.
Hit Chance can reach 100%. For every {POTENCY} point beyond 100% increase crit chance by 1%.
Whenever Character miss, they'll gain 50 accuracy for 1 Turn.
A collection of advanced offensive spells for veterans.
A collection of advanced shield techniques for veterans.
Reduce the AP cost of using items by 1.

If there are enough free tiles around the unit, a random sapling will spawn on one of those tiles each round at the start of their first turn. 
If health falls below 50%, two random saplings will spawn instead.
If an enemy is killed and the excess damage is greater than {POTENCY}% of its max hitpoints, deal half of the excess damage to all of the surrounding enemies.
Increase dodge chance against ranged skills by {POTENCY}.
If Character executes an enemy, reset the cooldown for the Teleport Skill.
Range of all Aura Effects are increased by  {POTENCY} tiles.
Lightning Damage heals the Character instead of damaging them. Cannot be shocked.
Deal {POTENCY}% more damage to enemies for each ally that surrounds them.
On Death: Deal {PHYSICAL_DAMAGE} in a 1 Tile Radius with a height tolerance of 1.
The Bandit King has made a pact with Lucifer. The price of which he is not fully aware of.
A collection of basic shield techniques for novices.
If there is not enough SP to use a skill, Health will be used instead.(Remaining Health has to be more than 1).
Character gains an AP whenever they defeat an enemy. (Can only restore up to {POTENCY} AP per turn)
Increase Damage against enemies with bleeding by {POTENCY}%
Whenever Character heals another single Target, they'll also heal themselves for {POTENCY}% of the amount. Only triggers when Character has more than zero SP.
On Turn Start: If the character is stunned or terrified, the conditions can be removed by spending 10 SP for each condition.
A collection of instructions targeted towards allies.
Set the Character's {INTELLIGENCE} to {POTENCY}. Has no effect if their {INTELLIGENCE} is higher without it.
Whenever Character deals more than 30% of their target's health as damage with a weapon skill, there is a {POTENCY}% chance to stun the target.
Reduce cooldown of Minor Curses by 2.
A collection of Dark Magic Spells to harm the living
A collection of Curses to cripple the living.
Whenever a target manages to successfully roll a dodge against an attack. There is a {POTENCY}% chance for it to still hit the target.
Deal {POTENCY}% more damage for each negative statuseffect the target has.
When Character reaches 0 Hitpoints, restore all hitpoints, gain an additional action per round and gain new skills.
Everytime this Character uses a dragonic skill, they gain a dragon scale stack.

Character gains 50 Physical Resistance. The Skill <color=orange>{EARTH_SURGE}</color> can target an additional target and the skills <color=orange>{EARTH_RING}</color> and <color=orange>{EARTHQUAKE}</color> do not affect allies anymore. SP cost of Earth Skills are reduced by 30%.
If Bard has the skill <color=orange>"Background Musician"</color> increase the amount BP gained through songs by {POTENCY}.
A technique to send a wave of arcane energy of a chosen element towards your enemy.
A collection of different fighting Stances
If health falls below {POTENCY}%, Character gains hidden for 1 turn. Can only trigger once per battle.
A spell to enchant a blade with a chosen element.
Reduce BP Cost of Brave Actions by {POTENCY}%. Reduce BP Cost of Brave Skills by 5.
Increase Block, Crit, Dodge, Speed ,PAB and MAB by {POTENCY}% if Bravery is at least confident.
Character deals more damage against enemies who acts after({POTENCY}% per difference in Initiative). If enemies have multiple turns then it only applies if all turns are after the Character's turn.
Can pass through obstacles while moving and hostile melee skills have an additional 25% to miss.
Set the Character's Strength to {POTENCY}. Has no effect if their Strength is higher without it.
Increase damage of Skills targeting only 1 target by {POTENCY}%.
Increase the damage reduction of dragon scale by {POTENCY} points.
Healing effects do not heal enemies but instead they are damaged for {POTENCY}% of the value. Undead enemies are affected as usual.
Enemies are less inclined to target this Character.
All adventurers on the same quest with Selene have +{POTENCY} death resist. Increase wage by 30%.
Every time character inflicts damage on an enemy, there is a {POTENCY} chance to get stunned.
For each Goblin-Ally: Increase PAB by 10%, increase MAB by 10%, increase Accuracy by 2, increase Crit by 1. If there are more than 10 Goblin Allies, increase movement by 1.(Capped at 10 allies).
If character hasn't moved on their turn, increase the Damage of Bow Skills by {POTENCY}% and increase their range by 1.
Whenever the Character blocks a skill, they gain two stacks of Demonic Charge.
Healing effect are {POTENCY}% stronger and will also remove bleeding.
Healing effect are {POTENCY}% stronger and 20% of the healing amount will also restore sp.(SP-Restore will not trigger on self)
Character cannot be stunned and reduce duration of hostile status effects by 1(Minimum 1).
Whenever Character defeats an enemy all Allies gain {POTENCY} BP.
Whenever Character applies the Weakened or the Vulnerable status to a target, increase the amount of stack by {POTENCY}.
Cannot be stunned, frozen, moved or delayed.
Reduce damage from Arcane or Divine Skills by {POTENCY}% per level up to 70%.
<i>"Blood for blood and an eye for and eye. Azazel will go much further than that."
<i>"Forget duty. Forget responsibilities. None of those matter to Belephegor."
<i>"Every rose has it thorns. Lilith's thorns will bleed you dry."
<i> "It is said that Lucifer was once the highest archangel under the service of the divines but became a demon lord when he could no longer stand being lower than the gods."
Gain Access to the Martial Arts Skilltree.
Character gains +20 Crit Chance. The Skill "Chain Lightning" can hit one additional target and "Lightning Storm" does not affect allies anymore. SP cost of Lightning Skills are reduced by 30%.
While hidden: Increase Movement by 2 and increase crit chance by 20.
Character receives no penalty to accuracy for ranged skills, when surrounded by enemies. Ranged skills can not have a higher range than 3.
As long as the Character has more than 50% SP, reduce incoming Damage by 10%,
Add an additional {POTENCY}% of your Strength Bonus to your Physical Attack Bonus.
Increase damage dealt by 10%. Empower Stacks can stack up to 10 times now.
Add {POTENCY}% of Block as Physical Attack Bonus. <color=orange>{SHIELD_BASH}</color> now also deals damage.
For every 2% above 50% SP, increase Magical Attack Bonus by 1%
Whenever character targets an enemy with a physical melee skill, reduce the accuracy of the target by {POTENCY}.
Add {POTENCY}% (rounded down) of Willpower to Physical Attack Bonus and Magical Attack bonus.
If the character dodged or blocked an attack then the counter automatically crits.
Whenever unit gets damaged, deal {POTENCY}% of MAB as fire damage to all units in a 1-Tile-Area around the unit.
Whenever Character gets hit by an enemy with a melee Skill there is a {POTENCY}% Base Chance for the enemy to get poisoned.  The amount of poison is equal to half the Character's level.
Increase damage of ranged skills the closer the Character is. (Next to target: +50%, 1 tile distance: +25%).
Effects from potions last {POTENCY} turns/rounds longer.
Whenever Character heals a target, the target also gains a Barrier. The strength of the Barrier is {POTENCY}% of the amount healed.
Extend the Area of Effect of all Divine skills that target multiple allies to mapwide. (Only affects skills that solely targets allies.)
Increase Range of Bow Skills by 1.
Increase Range of Melee Skills by 1
Reduce AP-Cost of the Skill <color=orange>Throw Knife</color> by {POTENCY}.
For each Tile you move gain an Empowered Stack until the end of your turn. (Max. {POTENCY} Stacks)
Add {POTENCY}% of your Dexterity to PAB.
Every Turn Unit has a {POTENCY}% chance to receive a stack of Revelation. The saint receives unique effects the more stacks of Revelation they have.
Holy knowledge only known to the Divine Messenger and her chosen saint.
Increase enemy drop chance. Gain an addtional 5 Gold for each defeated enemy after battle.
Damage Effects ignore 50 Points of any Resistances.
Gain {POTENCY} SP upon killing an enemy.
A collection of different Arrows for specific situations.
Character can pass through enemies and movement does not trigger attack of opportunities.
If Character fails to dodge,there is a 1% per {POTENCY} points of Dodge (up to 50%)  chance for the damage to be reduced by half.
Increase healing by 10% and all buffs last 1 turn longer.
Reduce AP cost of Arcane Skills by 1.

Whenever an enemy is defeated with a sword skill, the SP cost is refunded and the cooldown for all sword skills is reduced by 1(Does not trigger multiple times for AOE-Skills). All block is converted into dodge.
Techniques taught to every disciple of the Azure-Style.
Blade Forms Ferdinand can change into
If the character is the leader, they gain a skill with which they can target an enemy, causing all other allies in range with this skill to attack the target
Reduce Received Damage by {POTENCY}% for each adjacent ally with this skill.
Increase Chain Attack Chance by {POTENCY}% for allies with this skill.
Reduce Damage against allies with this skill by {POTENCY}%.
Increase damage against enemies that occupy mutliple tiles by {POTENCY}%.
If the Character is the Leader and a bard, double the effects of all songs if applicable.
Increase death resist by {POTENCY}% for each adjacent ally with this skill.
If character is the leader, increase damage dealt by 10% for each ally with this skill. Otherwise reduce it by 20%.
All physical damage are considered true damage now and the damage reduction from Ki Armor is increased to 50%.
If the character is the leader reduce their movement by 1. If not, then increase the movement of this character to the movement value of the leader. Nothing changes if their movement value is higher.
Increase the bonus hit chance for each ally with this skill surrounding the target  from 5% to 10%.
Increase the damage against a target for each ally with this skill surrounding it by {POTENCY}%.
Reduce the hitchance of enemies targeting this character by {POTENCY}%, for each ally surrounding the enemy with this skill.
Increase block by {POTENCY} for each adjacent ally with this skill, if they wield swords and shields as weapons.
Increase Hitpoints by 30% and start each turn with 6 AP(1 Movement AP and 5 Normal AP). BP cost for Rush is reduced to 15 BP.
If the character wields a sword and shield and wears heavy armor, they receive 20% more damage for each ally with this skill. Otherwise, they receive 30% less damage.
Whenever Character applies poison on an enemy, there is a {POTENCY}% chance for the poison to be also applied on an adjacent enemy.
Set the Character's Endurance to {POTENCY}. Has no effect if their Endurance is higher without it.

Whenever the Character deals damage to an enemy, all allies gain 2 stacks of Empowered.
Whenever the Character blocks or dodges an attack, all allies gain 2 stacks of Protected.

Reduce stamina loss by travelling by 50%.
Increase Endurance by 2 and Endurance Growth by 20.

Reduce Damage taken by {POTENCY}% for every adjacent enemy.
Increase Damage dealt by {POTENCY}% for every adjacent enemy.
Damage is increased by {POTENCY}% against the last enemy who has dealt damage to Alissa.
All Commander skills cost 1 less AP.
One or more Adventurers go and gather resources near the Fortress. While the surrounding area is rich in basic resources, you'd be hard pressed to find any rare materials.

Skills with the tag Concealed deal {POTENCY}% bonus damage if one of the following applies:
Another ally is adjacent to the target.
The target is either stunned, frozen, exposed, blinded, sleeping or staggered.
Character is hidden and the target doesn't have true sight.

Sneak Attacks do not trigger Counters.
The ability to master and manipulate the shadows for one's own advantage.
Deals {POTENCY}% more damage against the last unit who harmed it.
Increase the bonus gained from the Bravery State <color=orange>{CONFIDENT}</color> and <color=orange>{HEROIC}</color> by {POTENCY}%.
Reduce the Crit Chance against this target by 30.

As long there is a Phylactery on the battlefield, apply the following effects on the Lich, when they receive a killing blow:
{EFFECTS}

Each companion has 50% more hitpoints. Bear gains a skill to grant Guardian Angel to their summoner. Eagle gains a skill to trigger chain attacks with their summoner. Wolf gains Skill to move through enemies without triggering Attack of Opportunities.
Whenever this Character causes bleeding, all previous bleeding stacks will be triggered as true damage against the target.
Gain complete control over character's summons during their turn.
Unit triggers chain attack for their Summoner.
Enemies will no longer get bonus hit chance for each of their ally surrounding this unit.
Increase poison chance against undead by {POTENCY}%.
Increase the base damage of <color=orange>{SHADOW_SCYTHE}</color> to {POTENCY}.
You can activate one additional stance from <color=orange>{ENCHANT_BLADE}</color>.
A collection of basic support spells for novices.
Unit gains 3 stack of <color=orange>{UNTOUCHABLE}</color> at the start of every round.

When this Phylactery is destroyed, a part of Edmund's soul will return. The following effects will be applied to the lich:
{EFFECTS}
At the Start of each round a random enemy will become the target of envy. If the unit gets taunted, then instead of being taunted, the source of the taunt will become the envy target.
On death, all adventurers will lose 10 BP.
Increase range of Ranged Arcane Skills by {POTENCY}.
Reduces damage from hostile physical ranged skills by {POTENCY}% for each tile the enemy is away from the unit. Is negated by the <color=orange>{MELEE_ARCHER}</color> skill.
A collection of advanced support spells for veterans.
Reduce the max. hit chance of blind enemies against this character to 10%.
A spell to enchant a weapon with a chosen element.
Reduce Damage by {POTENCY}% for each Pile of Gold on the field.
{PROTECTED} Stacks can stack up to 9 times now.

Whenever an adjacent enemy tries to move, the character attacks the enemy with base accuracy 80%, dealing 100% PAB physical damage. If the attack hits the enemy, the enemy lose their action instead. Hidden enemies are not affected.
The first time using a consumable in a round, will cost no AP.
A collection of songs for experienced bards.
Increase Crit chance by 50% if target's health is below 20%.
Reduce Damage to Allies in the Party by {POTENCY}%.
Character gains 2 {EMPOWER} stacks for 1 turn whenever they defeat an enemy if they have less than 10 stacks.
Each skill to summon an animal companion, gains an additional charge.
Whenever character attacks an enemy with a {SWARM} Skill, each ally with the same skill also uses it against the same target if they're in reach.
A collection of legendary offensive spells for masters of the Arcane.
Reduces the Damage received from counters by {POTENCY}%.
Unit gains a stack of {RAGE} whenever they deal damage. All stacks will be removed at the end of round if no damage has been dealt that round.

Ice Skills that can affect enemies will now also add 2 stacks {VULNERABLE} for 2 turns. The Skills <color=orange>{ICE_SPIKES}</color> and <color=orange>{ICE_STORM}</color> do not affect allies anymore and SP cost of Ice Skills are reduced by 30%.
Cannot gain any negative Status Effects

Extend the duration of {BURNING} status effects by 1. The Skills <color=orange>{FIREBALL}</color> and <color=orange>{INFERNO}</color> do not affect allies anymore and SP cost of Fire Skills are reduced by 30%.
Takes {POTENCY}% less damage from ranged skills.
Reduce the counter of <color=orange>{UNDEATH}</color>-effects of allies by 1. Undead allies have +1 Movement.
When Character reaches 0 Hitpoints, restore all hitpoints, a new Battlemap Effect will be added to the battlefied and Character gains new skills.
Increase Physical Attack Bonus by {POTENCY}% of {INTELLIGENCE}.
Whenever this unit gains {RELEVATION}, add another {POTENCY} stacks on top of it.
Target gains a Barrier negating Damage up to {COMPOSITION} {AMOUNT} points.
Moves {RANGE} Tiles away from caster or until interrupted
Moves {RANGE} Tiles towards caster or until interrupted
Moves towards selected Tile until reached or interrupted
Move to random free tile that is no more than {RANGE} tiles away
Moves {RANGE} Tiles away from target or until interrupted
Pull into a free adjacent tile to the Caster
Moves {RANGE} Tiles into the chosen direction or until interrupted
Occupy target tile and push all other units away
A single Character goes out to hunt for supplies. The party receives 2-4 Supplies.
One adventurer encourages another adventurer to restore BP. The amount of BP restored, depends on their relationship.
A character sharpens their weapon, granting themself 20% more Physical Attack Bonus for 3 Encounters.
A character performs a magic ritual to grant the whole Party 20 Resistance against all Elements for 3 Encounters.
A character poisons their weapon. Weapon skills now also have a change of poisoning the targets.
A character holds a prayer for the party, restoring 15% HP for everyone.
For the next 3 Encounters increase dodge by 15.
The Party gathers to formulate a battle plan for the upcoming battles. For the next 3 encounters Adventurers start with 1 additional AP for 3 rounds.
For the next 3 Encounter Adventurer will be hidden at the start of the battle for 3 turns.
Character bless another adventurer in the name of their gods. For the next 3 encounter selected Adventurer will start with 2 Stacks of Protected.
An adventurer performs first aid on a wounded partymember. Restore 10% of health.
A character starts to meditate to recover more mana. Restore an additional 20% SP.
A adventurer stands guard for the night. Reduce ambush chance by 50%.
The bard plays a song to encourage everyone around them. Restore 10 BP for every adventurer.
Adventurer gains 30% more physical Resistance for 3 Encounters.
A character prepares their spells for the next battles. For the next encounter the first arcane skill will have no AP or SP cost.
Removes all Stat Debuffs on the target
Moves the target's Turn forward by {DELAY_AMOUNT}
If target is executed, apply on self: {EFFECTS}
Extend Range of Skills by 1(up to max 5)
Heals the caster by {PERCENTAGE} of the damage caused.
Increase {BONUS} scaling by another {SCALING}% for every 1% missing health from target.

Create a Trap interrupting movement when passed and causing the following Effects:
{EFFECTS}
The tagged skills({SKILLTAGS}) have these additional effects:{EFFECTS}

When health goes below 50% hitpoints: 
Unit teleports to a random safe tile and 4 <color=red> Ice Bride Mirages</color> will be summoned around the unit. 
Unit gains the Skill <color=orange>{ABSOLUTE_ZERO}</color> and <color=orange>{FROSTVEIL}</color>
On Getting Damaged: Gain 1 stack of {EMPOWERED} and 1 stack of  {PROTECTED} for 1 turn.
Every time unit has lost 20% of their max health, teleport them to a safe tile.

If health falls below 50%:
Unit's movement is reduced by 2 and they lose the skill <color=orange>{CHARGE}</color>. Unit gains new skills in exchange.
For every Point of Bleeding deal another additional {MAGNITUDE} Damage as True Damage.
Gain a Turn at the beginning of the turn order.
Transform all corpses into Zombies that can act immediately.

Grants the character the <color=orange>{VAMPIRIC_TRAITS}</color> Trait, which grants them 30% Lifesteal, +10 Physical Resistance, +10 Ice Resistance and -10 Fire Resistance. Might have other consequences, you're not aware of.
Deal 30% of the Character's level as true damage per {CHARGE} Stack(<color=white>{AMOUNT}</color>). Remove all {CHARGE} Stacks.
Effects will be applied again to a random target that is at most 2 tiles away(Until {AMOUNT} targets have been hit or it misses):
All allies in range will trigger a chain attack on the target.

Deal 50% PAB to all targets. 
If there is a fire enchantment on the weapon deal an additional 50% MAB as fire damage.
If there is an ice enchantment on the weapon deal an additional 50% MAB as ice damage.
If there is a lightning enchantment on the weapon deal an additional 50% MAB as lightning damage.
If there is an earth enchantment on the weapon deal an additional 50% MAB as earth damage.
Gain an {EMPOWER} Stack for each {VULNERABLE} Stack on the target.
Up to {X} times a random target will be selected in the affected area for the following effect:

Summon every Animal Companion not already on the field in the following order:
Wolf, Bear, Eagle

Adds the battlemap effect "{BATTLEMAPEFFECT}" for 3 turns with the following effects:
{EFFECTS}

If Ally: Remove all hostile status effects.
If Enemy: Remove all positive status effects and gain 3 stacks of {VULNERABLE} for 3 turns.
Repeat effect on each enemy directly behind the target. On the last target:

{EFFECT}
If target is still alive and the AP cost and SP cost can be afforded, repeat the Skill on the same target for the same costs.
Grants the character the <color=orange>{ETERNAL_YOUTH}</color> Trait, which grants them 10% bonus on HP and SP.
Increase Physical Resistance by {POTENCY} per level.
Attacks of Opportunities will now also trigger when enemies move past an adjacent tile. Does not trigger on enemies that occupy multiple tiles.
Add a Battlemap effect that will increase BP-Cost of Adventurers by {POTENCY}%.
Unit will gain a single turn at the start of the turn order.
Increase Range of {COMMAND}-Skills that don't target self by {POTENCY}.
Weapon skills will gain the appropriate Elemental Tag when a weapon enchantment effect is active.
Bravery State can never get lower than "{NORMAL}" and Character can never gain the {SHAKEN} status.
Set the Character's Dexterity to {POTENCY}. Has no effect if their Dexterity is higher without it.
Whenever this unit heals an ally, they'll also restore {POTENCY} BP.
PAB scales with Dexterity instead of Strength.
Increase the total amount of Reflection by {POTENCY}% of physical resistance.
Everytime the unit triggers Poison, Bleeding or Burning-Damage, reduce those Stacks by half.
Immediately trigger the poison damage. If the target dies, the poison stacks will be transferred to an adjacent enemy; otherwise, remove all poison stacks from the target.
Half of Physical Damage Scaling of damage effects will be converted to True Damage Scaling.
Reduce Damage received by 10% for each ally up to {POTENCY}%.
